thread.title: Centennial Bank, Summit Bank & Trust to combine in $83.5M deal

title: Centennial Bank, Summit Bank & Trust to combine in $83.5M deal
text:
Published By: Denver Post Business - Today 
Heartland Financial USA Inc., the operator of Summit Bank & Trust in Colorado, is acquiring CIC Bancshares Inc....
